discussion_comments.comment_body:
Just a drive-by comment that as an everyday user of TS, I don't really know what a "type relationship" is. Maybe this could be worded more explicitly as:

```suggestion
    "Enforce that mutable properties cannot satisfy 'readonly' requirements in assignment or subtype relationships.": {
```

commented_code:
"String literal import and export names are not supported when the '--module' flag is set to 'es2015' or 'es2020'.": {
         "category": "Error",
         "code": 18057
+    },
+    "Default imports aren't allowed for deferred imports.": {
+        "category": "Error",
+        "code": 18058
+    },
+    "Named imports aren't allowed for deferred imports.": {
+        "category": "Error",
+        "code": 18059
+    },
